pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/aiida-shell.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/aiida-shell)[![PyPI pyversions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/aiida-shell.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/aiida-shell)[![CI](https://github.com/sphuber/aiida-shell/workflows/ci/badge.svg)](https://github.com/sphuber/aiida-shell/actions/workflows/ci.yml)AiiDA plugin that makes running shell commands easy.Run any shell executable without writing a dedicated plugin or parser.## DocumentationPlease refer to the [online documentation](https://aiida-shell.readthedocs.io/) for a complete guide.
